timeline.subtitle: 4 easy steps to get the public information you need

timeline.step_3_desc: Request is processed according to the requested information category
timeline.step_4_desc: Information is ready to be downloaded or collected according to your choice
leadership.title: Governor & Vice Governor
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quick information regarding public information openness services in South Sulawesi
faq.a1: Public information is information generated, stored, managed, sent, and/or received by a public body...
faq.q2: How long does the information request process take?
faq.a2: According to Law No. 14 of 2008, PPID must respond within 10 working days at the latest...
faq.q3: Is there a fee for information requests?
faq.a3: Public information services at PPID South Sulawesi are free of charge. However, copying or courier fees are borne by the applicant.

survey_questions.q1: What is your opinion about the Information Service System provided by PPID South Sulawesi through the Online Website/Portal?
survey_questions.q2: What is your opinion regarding the ease of using the Online Information Request System provided by PPID South Sulawesi?
survey_questions.q3: What is your opinion about the quality of information available on the PPID South Sulawesi Website/Portal?
survey_questions.q4: What is your opinion about the ease of accessing information on the PPID South Sulawesi Website/Portal?
survey_questions.q5: How good is the appearance/interface of the PPID South Sulawesi Website/Portal?
survey_questions.q6: What is your opinion about the knowledge and mastery of PPID South Sulawesi officers in providing public information services?
survey_questions.q7: What is your opinion about the responsibility of PPID South Sulawesi officers in providing public information services?
survey_questions.q8: What is your opinion about the courtesy and friendliness of PPID South Sulawesi officers in providing public information services?
survey_questions.q9: What is your opinion about the clarity of information delivered by PPID South Sulawesi officers when providing services?
survey_questions.q10: What is your opinion about the completeness of requirements that must be met in Public Information Requests at PPID South Sulawesi?
survey_questions.q11: What is your opinion about the procedure/mechanism of Public Information Services at PPID South Sulawesi?
survey_questions.q12: What is your opinion regarding the timeliness of PPID South Sulawesi in providing Public Information Services?
survey_questions.q13: What is your opinion about the conformity of information provided by PPID South Sulawesi with the requested information?
survey_questions.q14: What is your opinion about the comfort of the Public Information Request Service Desk facilities at PPID South Sulawesi?
survey_questions.q15: What is your opinion about the security of Public Information Services at PPID South Sulawesi?
survey_questions.q16: What is your opinion about fairness/equity in obtaining Public Information Services from PPID South Sulawesi?
survey_questions.q17: What is your opinion on the South Sulawesi Public Information Service Declaration (Professional, Accurate and Responsible)?
survey_questions.q18: Write your comments/suggestions for the progress and development of Public Information Services through PPID South Sulawesi
privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.intro: PPID South Sulawesi Province is committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect the personal information you provide when using our PPID portal services.
terms_conditions.title: Terms & Conditions
terms_conditions.intro: By accessing and using the PPID South Sulawesi Province Portal, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.
